pkgmetadata.longdescription: File Conversion for 'Gem Infrasound Logger' // Reads data files from the 'Gem infrasound logger' for analysis and converts to segy format (which is convenient for reading with traditional seismic analysis software). The Gem infrasound logger is a low- cost, lightweight, low-power instrument for recording infrasound in field campaigns; email the maintainer for more information.
